response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe is perfectly suited to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $10,000. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a special introductory price of $9,500 for you. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and exceptional customer support. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or if you'd like to proceed with the purchase. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
